sentences.sContent: Isabel looked to Ron for enlightenment.
sentences.sCn: 伊莎贝尔希望得到罗恩的启发。

sentences.sContent: ...and you will be understood The enlightenment of this saying is not lost in our era but unwilling to understand others seems prevalent...

remMethod.val: 来自enlighten(vt. 启发， 启蒙)

words.tran: 开明的；文明的；进步的；被启发的
使人领悟的；有启发作用的
启发，启蒙；教导，开导；照耀

trans.tranCn: 启发， 开导； 开明， 文明
trans.tranOther: when you understand something clearly, or when you help someone do this
